fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per night, fucking kick a target out of your damn Graveyard and into the world of the living, reviving them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only use your ability while dead.
- At the end of Night 1, you will automatically die. Your body will be cleaned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make a faction win with at least 2/3 of its members alive. If only neutrals are alive when the game ends, you lose.
